fields.Title: APT ORB / encyclo logo of communism
Encyclopedia: "Because white is the colour of peac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Because white is the colour of peace.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The wreath of antlers represents a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The wreath of antlers represents a natural crown. It was about building a society that could exist in accord with the natural world -- and at the same time above it.

fields.Title: Endurance: "In other words, it doesn't mean a t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In other words, it doesn't mean a thing to *trüe* Revacholians.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Whatever kid drew this graffito wil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever kid drew this graffito will get it one day. You just can't beat FREEDOM and hustle-jiggling all the time.

fields.Title: You: "What does it evoke in me? [Finish t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What does it evoke in me? [Finish thought.]

fields.Title: You: "Why is the star upside down?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why is the star upside down?

fields.Title: You: "Inspect the symbol closer."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspect the symbol closer.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "To symbolize the toppling of the ol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: To symbolize the toppling of the old order.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You are the Big Communism Builder n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You are the Big Communism Builder now. It's you or no one.

fields.Title: You: "What's the deal with the antlers?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's the deal with the antlers?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He doesn't actually reach for his g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't actually reach for his gun.

fields.Title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The star-and-antlers was developed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The star-and-antlers was developed in the sixth decade of the last century and quickly adopted by Mazov and the communards during the Revolution...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Nothing at all yet. Right now it's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing at all yet. Right now it's just meaningless shapes on a wall.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Even today, half a century after, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even today, half a century after, the star-and-antlers retains the ability to evoke hope, disappointment, and fear in equal measure.

fields.Title: You: "Why white?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why white?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Communism is the ideology of gutles..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Communism is the ideology of gutless intellectuals and clueless university students. They don't care about the *real* wörking man.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The price of idealism unrestrained..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The price of idealism unrestrained by humanism. Never again.

fields.Title: You: ""Look out, Kim: There are communist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look out, Kim: There are communists around here."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Also, some social democrats were al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Also, some social democrats were already using it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll keep my Armistice handy, dete..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll keep my Armistice handy, detective."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Gone. Gone is the glory. Of hope, o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Gone. Gone is the glory. Of hope, only the scribblings of impoverished students remain. In dirty hallways...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You see noble aims but also mountai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see noble aims but also mountains upon mountains of corpses. They should've taken a more *measured* approach. Also, you're really smart.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "That isn't *just* a five-pointed st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That isn't *just* a five-pointed star -- it's an inverted white pentagram cradled in a wreath of antlers. The iconography of communism, in other words.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Smug superiority? Esthetic musings?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smug superiority? Esthetic musings? The triumph of Capital is undeniable, but... maybe the guns were sort of cool? Revolutionaries had loads of guns.
